strength_details: Modern Azure data stack (Databricks, DevOps, Blob Storage)
Established enterprise company (IBM) with global presence
Clear data engineering focus with both batch and real-time processing
concern_details: No salary, benefits, or compensation information disclosed
Onsite role restricted to Kochi, Kerala, India only
No career progression or growth opportunities mentioned
Unclear reporting structure and team composition
best_fit_details: Mid-level data engineers (4-6 years) with Azure experience
Engineers specializing in Azure Databricks and modern data platforms
Professionals seeking stable enterprise environment over startup pace
probe_details: Ask about compensation, benefits, and total compensation package
Understand reporting structure and team hierarchy
Clarify team size and composition within the delivery center
Discuss career progression opportunities within IBM
leverage_details: Strong Azure Databricks and PySpark experience matches requirements exactly
Experience with predictive modeling and statistical analysis is valuable
summary.overall_assessment: Solid enterprise data engineering role at IBM with modern Azure stack. Good for professionals seeking stable environment and technical growth. Main concerns are lack of transparency around compensation and career progression, plus geographic restriction to Kochi, India.
